title: Build and Deploy Workflow
description: Create a workflow that builds Android APK and deploys to Play Store internal track.
instructions:
Complete the deployment workflow that:

1. Triggers when a version tag (v*) is pushed
2. Decodes the keystore from a base64 secret
3. Builds a signed release APK using environment variables for signing
4. Uploads the APK as an artifact with 14-day retention
5. Deploys to Google Play Store internal track using the upload action
hints: Use 'v*' pattern to match tags like v1.0.0, v2.1.3, etc.
The keystore secret should be named KEYSTORE_BASE64 for clarity
Add --release flag to build a release APK
The internal track is used for internal testing before wider release
